positions.title: Scrum Master, Software Developer
responsibilities: Lead a team of 9 developers and software testers
Implemented and maintained multiple payment platforms: multiple credit card gateways, Google Wallet, PayPal, and Bill Me Later
Developed a system to automatically compute refunds and cancellation penalties
Added internationalization and multi-currency support
Added support for multi-level encryption of sensitive credit card information
Added white label product for affiliates to customize the look and feel of the website
Developed multiple internal tools, including an implementation of PHP_CodeSniffer
Implemented Jenkins for continuous integration and code quality reporting
Started and facilitated an employee-driven training program

positions.title: Operations Accountant III
responsibilities: Supervised revenue recovery program for insufficient funds transactions, including payment acceptance and violation enforcement
Supervised 6 full-time employees
Prepared monthly reconciliations of cash funds and deposit accounts
Assisted in development of new financial and operation reports, including writing business requirements
Reviewed monthly and quarterly traffic and revenue reports to ensure accuracy of data
Assisted with training presentations for the Chief Financial Officer and senior accounting staff, and developed training documents
Documented internal controls related to toll collection

positions.title: Internal Audit Intern
responsibilities: Tested various internal controls as part of a Sarbanes-Oxley compliance program
Tested internal controls related to purchasing, accounts payable and receivable, payroll, inventory, and fixed assets
Traveled to airport stations for field audits to ensure compliance with company policies

volunteer.company: Orlando 2018 - Bid to Bring the Gay Games to Orlando

positions.title: Director of Technology
responsibilities: Served on the Board of Directors for the Orlando bid committee
Created the Information Systems Plan portion of the Orlando bid book
Set up, configured, and maintained Amazon EC2, RDS, and ElastiCache instances
Set up and administered Redmine for issue tracking
Implemented Drupal 7 for content management using a custom-designed theme

images.alt: The strategic plan for all of the computer systems to be put in place if Orlando were successful in its bid (PDF, 222 KiB)
Drupal 7 implementation for content management with a custom-designed responsive theme
A single-page responsive website showcasing LGBTQ athletes

positions.title: Executive Director
responsibilities: Supervised all operations and activities of the organization
Created and lead the Conference Host Selection Committee
Served as the primary point-of-contact for FCPC Conference host committees
Maintained all of the organization's financial, membership, and corporate records
Served on the Board of Directors, including in leadership positions
Wrote the organization's bylaws and numerous amendments to them
